name: adbm-mongodb
description: mongoDB adapter for adbm database migration tool

scripts.docker:db: docker start adbm_dev_db || docker run --name adbm_dev_db -p 27017:27017 -d mongo:4.0
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "Do not use publish script directly, use publish:dist script instead."; exit 1
scripts.preversion: yarn run lint && yarn run test
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json && cp package.json .npmignore *.md LICENSE dist/
scripts.pack:dist: yarn run build; (cd dist; yarn pack --filename package.tgz)
scripts.publish:dist: yarn run pack:dist; yarn publish dist/package.tgz --ignore-scripts
